languages.text: "Чтобы знать, к чему ты идешь, нужно сначала раскрыть, откуда тянутся твои корни — так говорят мудрецы Ифрита. Надеюсь, найденные ответы помогут тебе, шерин".
"To know where you're going, first you must discover where your roots begin — so say the sages of Efreet. I hope the answers you find will help you, shereen."
languages.original_text: "Чтобы знать, к чему ты идешь, нужно сначала раскрыть, откуда тянутся твои корни — так говорят мудрецы Ифрита. Надеюсь, найденные ответы помогут тебе, шерин".

traits.locale_text: "To know where you're going, first you must discover where your roots begin — so say the sages of Efreet. I hope the answers you find will help you, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "To know where you're going, first you must discover where your roots begin — so say the sages of Efreet. I hope the answers you find will help you, shereen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “艾弗里特的圣贤们曾说过这样的话：‘若知前路何往，须知源起何方。’我希望这个回答能帮到你，亲爱的。”
languages.original_text: "To know where you're going, first you must discover where your roots begin — so say the sages of Efreet. I hope the answers you find will help you, shereen."

traits.locale_text: “艾弗里特的圣贤们曾说过这样的话：‘若知前路何往，须知源起何方。’我希望这个回答能帮到你，亲爱的。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Comme le disent les sages d'Éfrit, pour savoir où l'on va, il faut découvrir d'où l'on vient. Puissent ces réponses vous aider, shereen. »
languages.original_text: "To know where you're going, first you must discover where your roots begin — so say the sages of Efreet. I hope the answers you find will help you, shereen."

traits.locale_text: « Comme le disent les sages d'Éfrit, pour savoir où l'on va, il faut découvrir d'où l'on vient. Puissent ces réponses vous aider, shereen. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Para saber hacia dónde vas, tienes que conocer tus orígenes. Eso dicen los sabios de Efreet. Espero que las respuestas que encuentres te ayuden, shereen».
languages.original_text: "To know where you're going, first you must discover where your roots begin — so say the sages of Efreet. I hope the answers you find will help you, shereen."

traits.locale_text: «Para saber hacia dónde vas, tienes que conocer tus orígenes. Eso dicen los sabios de Efreet. Espero que las respuestas que encuentres te ayuden, shereen».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「自分の行き先を知るためには、まず自分のルーツがどこから始まるのかを知る必要がある…イフリートの賢人たちはそう言ってる。アンタが見つけた答えが、助けになることを願うよ」
languages.original_text: "To know where you're going, first you must discover where your roots begin — so say the sages of Efreet. I hope the answers you find will help you, shereen."

traits.locale_text: 「自分の行き先を知るためには、まず自分のルーツがどこから始まるのかを知る必要がある…イフリートの賢人たちはそう言ってる。アンタが見つけた答えが、助けになることを願うよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Um zu wissen, wohin man geht, muss man erst entdecken, wo seine Wurzeln beginnen. Das sagen die Weisen von Efreet. Ich hoffe, Shereen, die Antworten, die Ihr findet, werden Euch helfen."
languages.original_text: "To know where you're going, first you must discover where your roots begin — so say the sages of Efreet. I hope the answers you find will help you, shereen."

traits.locale_text: "Um zu wissen, wohin man geht, muss man erst entdecken, wo seine Wurzeln beginnen. Das sagen die Weisen von Efreet. Ich hoffe, Shereen, die Antworten, die Ihr findet, werden Euch helfen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "To know where you're going, first you must discover where your roots begin — so say the sages of Efreet. I hope the answers you find will help you, shereen."

languages.text: "Nereye gittiğini bilebilmek için köklerinin nereye dayandığını bilmen gerekir. İfrit âlimleri böyle söyler. Umarım bulduğun cevaplar sana yardımcı olur şirinim."
languages.original_text: "To know where you're going, first you must discover where your roots begin — so say the sages of Efreet. I hope the answers you find will help you, shereen."

traits.locale_text: "Nereye gittiğini bilebilmek için köklerinin nereye dayandığını bilmen gerekir. İfrit âlimleri böyle söyler. Umarım bulduğun cevaplar sana yardımcı olur şirinim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
